title: Ana maTTum sonnEn
sahitya:
Ana maTTum sonnEn (unakku) inda AraNangu tanai tUdu shenru vara Enidanru pala nUrughanda murai


anupallavi

  gAnak-kuzhalUdi kaNNediril kaNDavarai valai vIsi varum mOna mukhak-kaNNan 
munnE shenrALAyin indat-tOzhi pOnadai marandiDuvAL konjam yOci nI enru


caraNam 1    nindanai sheidAlum aduvO porukkAdu nEril shollaDi enrAl aduvum AghAdu 
undanODu pEsha enrAl pOdum pOdAdu uLLadai shollavO ennAl onrumE AghAdu
    caraNam 2    meLLa meLLa endirundu pOip-pAraDi vENumenrAl tuNaiyAgha varuvEnaDi 
kaLLam ariyAnenru AnaiyiDuvEnaDi kaNnanO enrum un kaNNan tAnaDi
